hyp_text: Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas Governor Rick Perry, and House Tea Party Caucus leader Michelle Bachmann were all tied for second place, with 10 percent each.

src_text: Panuma ya kwisa kwa nsebo, Gingrich alitasha Santorum, lelo alikwete amashiwi ayakosa ayo aebele Romney, untu ama kampeni ayabipa yaiminineko ayabilishiwe pa milabasa mu Iowa ayakususha Gingrich.
ref_text: After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich.
hyp_text: After the New Hampshire primary, Gingrich declined to attack Santorum, instead aiming attacks at Romney, whom Gingrich’s campaign said was a “Massachusetts moderate” who “can’t beat Obama”.

src_text: Perry alandile ukutila alingile “ukubwelela ku Texas ukuyaceceta insebo sha kulongana kwa buno bushiku, ukumona nga cakuti kuliko inshila yandi iya kuya ku ntanshi muli ulu lubulo”, lelo panuma akatwalililapo ukusangwa muli ulu lubilo no kucimfyanyako mu kusala kwakubalilapo ukwa mu South Carolina pa 21 Janiwale.
ref_text: Perry stated that he would "return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary.
hyp_text: Perry said he had planned to “go to Texas and pray for a nation in crisis, to see if there’s an answer for our country, and hope that America will turn back to God”, but had instead found himself in a “profound crisis” of his own making and had withdrawn from the South Carolina race on January 21.

src_text: Webusaiti ye lyashi lya fya kusansamusha iya TMZ yaliumfwa ukuti kakopa wa fikope aiminike motoka yakwe kulubali lumbi ulwa musebo wa Sepulveda Boulevard nokwesha ukukopa ifikpe fya ncende iimininapo ba kapokola ilyo talaciluka umusebo no kukonkanyapo, icapatikishe kapokola wa California Highway Patrol uwalepindulula imyendele ya pa musebo ukumweba ukubwelelamo, pamiku ibili.
ref_text: Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice.
hyp_text: The TMZ website reported that the driver of the limousine was issued a citation for making an illegal U-turn on Sepulveda Boulevard and for having no license on his person at the time of the collision, which was confirmed by a California Highway Patrol officer who investigated the accident scene, two days later.

src_text: Ishiwi lya kuti Technological determinism lyali bimbwamo imitontokanishishe iya pusanapusana iingi, ukutapila pa kusongelekesha kwa technology nelyo pa bucindami bwa technological no kufika ku cishinka cakuti ubumi bwa bantu bulomfwana ne fisambilisho fya science nefyo fya suminishiwa pali technology.
ref_text: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.
hyp_text: The notion of technological determinism is still a subject of debate among scholars, with considerable difference over definitions and the use of the concept.

src_text: Ilingi ukwilula kwa technological determinism kwakwata imisango yakumwenamo ifintu ibili: ukuti ubuyantashi ubwa ifyakutukutatukuta ifine bukonka inshila iyacila pa ntambi nefya cifyalilwa, elyo nokuti ifyakutukutatukuta fyalikwata amaka yakupilibulako imikalile ya cifyalilwa ukucila ifyo ifisambilishiwa.
ref_text: Most interpretations of technological determinism share two general ideas: that the development of technology itself follows a path largely beyond cultural or political influence, and that technology in turn has "effects" on societies that are inherent, rather than socially conditioned.
hyp_text: The most common understanding of technological determinism is that technology develops as the sole cause of developments in areas such as science, politics, and social life, and not that technology is caused by any of these areas of culture.

hyp_text: Despite the fact that the city of Goma has an airport, all traffic coming from outside Goma is forced to pass through the port of Bukavu in South Kivu province.
